description: Mark duplicate reads in a BAM file (University of Michigan).

--in.description: Input BAM file name (must be sorted).

--out.description: Output BAM file name (same order with original file).

--minQual.description: Only add scores over this phred quality when determining a read's quality (default: 15)

--log.description: Log and summary statistics (default: [outfile].log, or stderr if --out starts with '-').

--oneChrom.description: Treat reads with mates on different chromosomes as single-ended.

--rmDups.description: Remove duplicates (default is to mark duplicates).

--force.description: Allow an already mark-duplicated BAM file, unmarking any previously marked duplicates and apply this duplicate marking logic.  Default is to throw errors and exit when trying to run on an already mark-duplicated BAM.

--noeof.description: Do not expect an EOF block on a bam file.

default.description: Default instance requires the users input for all files.

test.description: Instance for use with the test-harness.
